```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

1.  Create a branch

2.  Create a conflict by making changes to the same line of code both on main and on a branch

3.  Create merge request

4.  Resolve locally

5.  Create another conflict by creating a new branch and making a change to a file, delete the same file on main

6.  Resolve conflict using command line

7.  Create merge request for code review
